profile.name: Danylo B.
profile.title: Web Development Lead | Full Stack Software Engineer | Architect

title: I wish we were able to do more, to achieve more. I am confident in your success.
content:
It is time to move on.


It's been an incredible journey of learning, growth, and amazing teamwork. I'm truly grateful for the opportunities I've had and the friendships I've made here. Thank you for your support, collaboration, and the countless memories we've shared.


What’s next for me?


I have been doing IT since 2015 (wow, time flies). Throughout my journey, I was lucky to work with so many exceptional professionals who have shaped my life, supported me and are always there and ready to help. It is humbling and inspiring to kick asses(c) (~do a job on 110%) with you all. 

I got a chance to perfect my knowledge in startups, Fortune 500 companies, and top software service firms. I learned a lot. I did. And most of colleagues have been patient and supportive throughout this learning.


Today I start the most challenging part of my professional life. I am starting an IT company on my own in The Netherlands - Theia. Along with Theia I bring proven expertise in building scalable web solutions, systems as well as teams which can make IT products happen. I am proud to become an entrepreneur and run a business with my name on it. 


Until October - November 2024 I am working on my projects - Kitouch platform, donations and others.

Yet, you always can hire me on Upwork or contact me directly via my email (danbilokha@gmail.com).


Relevant links to stay in touch:

  1. LinkedIn,
  2. Insta,
  3. or mail me at danbilokha@gmail.com


I wish you all the best in your future endeavours. Thank you, everyone, for everything. I have been enjoying this ride so far a lot.


Dan,
